channel.title: Oral essays on education
channel.description:
The thoughts of distinguished Americans in a survey of American eduction.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Dr. Ernest O. Melby
item.description: Dr. Ernest O. Melby, distinguished professor of education, Michigan State University, on "A Last Look."
item.dc:creator: Michigan State University
item.dc:subject: NAEB Regions III & IV: The Upper Midwest
